InstantPods

Having your faulty AirPods instantly replaced.

The ultimate repair experience is here.

How it works?
Start a repair request

Faulty battery? Nasty sound?

AirPods keep disconnecting?

We are here to help. We will send you a replacement pair, and you return yours later

Charging Case Issue?

We take care of it. Start a repair request now and your replacement charging case will be on its way

Accidental Damage?

AirPods stopped working due to water or physical damage? We can send you a replacement and our expert team will take care of the rest.

?

Bud Missing?

Missing bud or Charing Case? Request one now! We offer it at a competitive price.

How it works?

  • Request your service online

    *Deposit Required

    *We will send you replacement first, but we need a deposit to make sure you will return your faulty AirPods.

    We will refund the deposit once we received your faulty part and it matches your request.

  • We will send out your replacement AirPods

  • Return your faulty AirPods with our pre-paid shipping label

  • We will diagnose your product with professional tools and finalize your service request

*Our replacements are refurbished by trusted experts who use genuine parts. The replacements you receive are equivalent to new products in performance and reliability
